ygData.subject: Re: LOOK AT THIS VERY IMPORTANT SERIOUS
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, whom do we e-mail? Does one person speak for us? Whom is that? Should be a very high level SK, because you would think he/she would know what they are
ygData.messageBody:
OK, whom do we e-mail? Does one person speak for us? Whom is that? Should be
a very high level SK, because you would think he/she would know what they
are talking about, and Verant would at least take them somewhat seriously.
Or do we flood Verant with e-mail?

Question how did the Paladins get their changes made?

If we flood we need to have a general topic (shouldn't send a form letter to
them). So we address:
1) weak pet. what do we want done? we get an even level pet? Need answers
on this from people.
2) harm touch resistance. should be none, since is was bestowed upon us by a
god? right? I didn't have a choice on god's therefor it must be a god thing
right?
3) want healing. at what level do we want it? 22? 15? 29? what level is it
feasible, according to necro spells.
4) exp point penalty. have no comment on this, other than that's life.
5) bad faction. same no comment. (or lack of any thing to say about it)
6) Invisibility at level 22. (rather be 15, just because I am 15, and that
is why if one person speaks for us it should be done by a level 45+ SK,
don't know of anyone that high though)
7) did I miss anything?

By the way if someone has the e-mail address, or how the paladins got their
changes let us know. All I have seen/heard are complaints and I would like
to change this and that. Someone actually know how? Would hate to just
aggravate Verant, and have them just deleting messages from us.

Sorry about all the question, just don't see anything progressing from this
string. Some high level SK stand up and take charge, and inform us lower
level characters. Information is power.

David
Tenin - lvl 15 Tarew Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>
To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 30, 1999 12:02 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] LOOK AT THIS VERY IMPORTANT SERIOUS


From: Xillith ofNeriak <xillith@...>

Thanks hon,
Lets take it to Verant and see what they think. I'm sure we will not
raise any new complaints but at least we can complain in a civil and
organised fashion. I noticed an earlier post on this board regarding
forming a petition, lets all put in our two cents. I've gotten attached to
the SK and would really like to see it pan out as a fully respected class.

~Xillith
